title: The Starwrought Heart
goal: Deal with the immediate aftermath of the battle.
stakes_shift: The protagonists are now the guardians of a new era.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra wake up on the edge of the now-silent Rift.
scenes.outcome: They are alive, but Kaelen's Star-Blade is now just a hilt.

scenes.summary: They look up to see the new star Astra created, shining brighter than all others.
The refugees find them, hailing them as heroes.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen and Lyra realize they cannot return to their old lives.

scenes.summary: They learn that the 'Falling Sickness' has been cured by the new star's light.
scenes.outcome: The immediate biological threat is gone.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra swear a new oath to each other—not to the stars, but to the people.
scenes.outcome: The 'Starwrought Oath' is reborn as a promise of protection.

scenes.summary: They begin the long walk back toward the ruins of Aethelgard.
scenes.outcome: The journey continues in a new form.
